/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, there's a factory with a tall smokestack, a testament to the city's industrial activity. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape.
